description:
Course Updated July 2015 - Over 700 students.

This course is designed for those of you who are ready to:

  • Make thousands by booking more speaking gigs without leaving your home.
  • Save thousands by reducing your speaker budget, no travel and expense hotel bills.

You recognize that:

  • There are limitless opportunities to collaborate with others
  • There are new ways of reaching your audience that are more cost-effective
  • You can grow your list of high-value buyers supper fast and at no cost
  • You can make a passive income from being part of a Professional Virtual Summit
  • You need to update your Professional Speaking skills

Hi I'm Wendy Kier,

I've spent years interviewing expert speakers on telesummits, webinars and interview series, I can tell you there is a massive difference between an average speaker and the ones that are truly successful and get the results.

The course provides you with the professional to learn new skills and how to turn your listeners into paying customers.

Here's Just A Taste Of What You'll Learnâ€¦

  • What a Virtual Summit is and how it can benefit your business moving forward.
  • How to ensure that you collect the details of hundreds of the best high-value leads
  • What is expected of you as a professional Virtual Summit Speaker
  • How to turn your high-value leads into becoming a customer
  • 6 Ways to re-purpose your interview at attract more high-value leads
  • How to find the very best Virtual Summits to Speak on
  • What needs to be in your Virtual Summit Speakers contact
  • Use the swipe files to secure Virtual Summit Speaking opportunities
  • A solid foundation in professional Virtual Summit Speaking
Here's hoping you get as much out of the course as I did making it.

Wendy Kier

Virtual Summit Expert

P.S. I am here online to support you, so make sure you ask all the questions you need.

Be a Champion for Professional Virtual Summit Speaking
title: Become a Profitable Virtual Online Summit Speaker Today
